snippet.title: Site to train 1,800 for Saudi gas project
snippet.content: Site Group has signed a third training services agreement with Al-Ajmi Company to service the needs for the Saudi Aramco led Fadhili gas project. This three-year contract is worth US$9.5 million (A$12m) in revenue for Site over 3 years and will develop 1,800 Saudi workers to meet the immediate needs of the Eastern Province - the largest oil and gas producing region of Saudi Arabia. The agreement is for delivery of technical training programs by subsidiary Site Skills Training for the new Nairiyah Construction Training College. Originally published as
